steps.step: Once the results display in the Data Grid, click Add to Saved Searches. The Add Search dialog box opens.
Enter a descriptive name, in the search name field.
To run a saved search, expand the My Saved Searches in the Search Criteria Pane, if it's collapsed.
Click the searchâ€™s name and the results display in the Data Grid.
To rename a saved search, place your cursor over the name of the saved search.
Enter a new name, in the search name field.
To delete a saved search place your cursor over the name of the saved search.
